*Pontaurus*
http://ipt.gbif.org/occResource.html?resource_id=11

= OGC =
GML model / searchable fields:
{{{
 guid (String)
 taxonId (Long)
 regionId (Long)
 scientificName (String)
 locality (String)
 institutionCode (String)
 collectionCode (String)
 catalogNumber (String)
 collector (String)
 dateCollected (String)
 basisOfRecord (String)
 coords (Coordinate[])
}}}

= TAPIR =
 * [http://www.tdwg.org/dav/subgroups/tapir/1.0/docs/tdwg_tapir_specification_2009-09-08.htm#toc57 TAPIR specs]

   * Capabilities: http://ipt.gbif.org/tapir/11/?op=c

   * Search: http://ipt.gbif.org/tapir/11/?op=s&model=dwc&f=Genus%20equals%20"Festuca"&s=5&l=5
